key.name: Wait a minute here. You're...
After the battle, atop $map:02000313$...
Is it over?
Ugh...
No. It's simply stopped moving... for now.
It won't stay down for long.
Then we'd better destroy it while we have a chance.
You can't! Its life force is tied to the war chief's!
If the Vayar falls, my father will, too!
So what? We're stuck up here, fighting forever?
What do we do...?
Won't you leave this problem to me?
Father!
I'm sorry if I worried you all. It seems I owe you a debt...
So please. Allow me to take care of this.
Father... What are you saying...?
The $npc:11003392$ and I are sworn to protect $map:02000051$, even if it costs us our lives.
I will see my duty through to the end.
What are you saying?!
There has to be another way. Let's think about this...
No. I will finish this with my own two hands.
This is our last chance. It's now or never.
$MyPCName$, $npc:11003389$ told me about you.
I hate to ask more of you, but... please look after my people.
Chief...
$npc:11003387$... son. You are now the war chief of $map:02000051$.
I know you will serve them better than I ever could. I leave the people of $map:02000051$ in your hands...
Father...
You're not going alone.
You don't expect all of the glory, do you?
You are my brother in arms. That means we stick together... to the very end.
$npc:11003393$... Looks like I'm getting you into trouble again. Good luck on the other side.
$npc:11003387$! I leave $npc:11003448$ in your care. I trust you will treat her with the respect she deserves.
I may not like it, but she adores you. I hope you two have lots of pups and make the Murpagoth strong.
Wh-what?!
The future is in our children's hands now. What do you say we face our ultimate battle together?
I would consider it an honor.
The honor is mine.
Raaaaugh!
It's time. Let's go!
Yaaaaah!
In my final moments... I have no regrets.
Thank you... Old friend...
Ah, that's better.
Thank you!
I think I can move now...
You're a lifesaver!
That was close.
Ugh, my head...
I can't remember a thing.
That was close!
Thank you!
Woof, woof! I'm okay now.
Thank you. Woof!
So... heavy... Woof!
Thank you. Woof!
Woof, woof! I'm okay now.
I owe you a favor! Woof!
Thank you. Woof!
Hmm?! Is that... Quickening Blood? Bring it to me. Meet me at the Ant Tunnel.
Fine, fine. I'll work!
Keep your hands off me!
Stop your nagging. I'm coming!
Just relax, will you?
I'm too tired for this!
Nope! Not gonna work!
Loosen up, would you?
You're such a nuisance!
Art thou who hast summoned me?
Only $npcName:11000039$ can soothe my rage!
If thou will not bring $npcName:11000039$, begone!
Screeeeech!
Thanks!
Screeeeech!
I was just resting!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!
Thanks!
I was just resting!
Who dare play a trick on me?!
Thou will regret summoning me!
Hot hot hot!
Who turned up the heat?!
Wh-what are you doing?!
Ouch!!
It burns!
Ack! Hot!
Fire!
Fire!
Squeeeeak!
Creeeak...
The shining door will close in 5 sec. You should hurry.
The shining door has closed.
The shining door will close in 5 sec. You should hurry.
The shining door has closed.
Minister, if I might have a moment of your time.
Huh? You're...
It was quite a shock. I always thought he was more cautious than that.
What did he say, exactly?
It was shortly before the incident. The archmage told $npc:11000033$ that he could sense something unusual from the subject.
Well, $MyPCName$ is rather unique. $male:He,female:She$ is fast and competent. I wish my servants had half of $male:his,female:her$ talent.
That's not what I meant by "unusual." Regardless, I disagree with how the archmage handled the situation.
I'm sure he had some kind of plan. A man like that doesn't take risks without carefully weighing the odds.
I think you're placing too much faith in him. Either that or you're scheming something.
Scheme? I never scheme. The minister of $map:02000001$ is above scheming!
I just hope he didn't make the wrong choice...

$MyPCName$...

That person told $npcName:11003074$ that they'd help her meet $npcName:11003075$ and asked for her to open the secret shrine. That person showed her $npcName:11003075$'s bracelet, which was was gifted to him by $npcName:11003074$ as a symbol.

Queen!

Queen...?

Since he tends to leave chaos in his wake, we need to be careful in how we proceed.

$npcName:11001698$ will surely return. And when that happens, all who we love will be in danger once more.

Wow. That's ridiculous.
How is that possible?

Pests must be stepped on and exterminated!

Prepare to attack!
Mission successful!
On the other hand, the Secret Knights, $npcName:11001822$, and his Dark Wind army were defeating $npcName:11001698$'s army in an empty field.
Dark Wind, engage. Kill everything!
Mission successful!
Gotcha, you rascal!
Look at you.
Hey, just bring them here!
The captain wants to see you!
A pirate gangster?
And what's with you?!
$npcName:11003086$. This guy is different from those pirates. Tell this person what you told me last time.
You look so different. Scared me there. If something dangerous is happening, let me know. Who knows? It might get resolved.
How naive of you, $npcName:11003085$. To want to help the humans... You don't know how pointless that is.
Humans will be the ones to push this world into extinction.
Although humans may not be the most perfect creatures...
They will not try to ruin this world if it's in danger.
Spare me. Humans can't even trust each other. They're too selfish.
Thanks to the returned mage of light, I've learned everything. I know of the destruction you'll bring to the world.
What?
Don't believe me? Then see for yourself.
Ah, $MyPCName$!
Come to your senses, little guy!
See? Now get lost.
Ee... Eeek... Wait!
What you showed me... I'm still not sure what it means.
But if someone's poor choices leads to a crisis...
Others will pool forces to block it. Please keep that in mind.
...How interesting, human.
Fine, I'll keep an eye out. I'll watch and see how whatever disaster comes next is handled.
But I wonder what the other Shinsoos will think of you... What they do is fully up to them. Remember that.
He's usually quite friendly... There must be a reason for his actions. Don't take it to the heart.
I'll talk it out some more... If there's something I need to tell you, I'll contact you. Also…
Would you deliver a message to $npcName:11000444$? Tell him that I hope he gets better soon... And that I'd like to see him again...
Are you blushing, $npcName:11003084$? You must like him a lot. He seemed rather ordinary to me...
I'll deliver the message. Thank you, $npcName:11003084$. Thank you, $npcName:11003085$.
You've failed to secure Empress $npcName:11001478$... Perhaps I've put too much trust in you, $npcName:11001698$.
But, $npcName:11001811$...! If $npcName:11001698$ had continued to use her strength there... $npcName:11001969$ may have turrned into an empress of destruction...
$npcName:11001811$ wanted $npcName:11001478$ alive and not awakened! $npcName:11001698$ didn't run away!
Also, we damaged their castle. Doesn't this mean $npcName:11001698$ succeeded?
...$npcName:11001698$. Keep this in mind.
You're a fool if you thought I'd give you a pat on the back for your failure.
You are as good as dead.
Gulp...!
You've lost your troops and made the enemy aware of our actions... Where exactly is the silver lining on that?
S-Sorry... $npcName:11001698$ is sorry...
Enough. I don't remember taking in such pitiful subordinates.
This is your last chance, $npcName:11001698$. This time, succeed.

Fight with $npcName:11003144$ this time. I didn't give you that dragon for a pet.
Okay...

Einos

$npcName:11003262$! Apologize to $npcName:11003264$ this instant.
I'm not the one making wild accusations! Why do I have to apologize? Professor $npcName:11003313$ isn't some lab rat for us to study and dissect.

Step aside, $MyPCName$.
Let her go, $MyPCName$. She needs some space.
I'll be going now.
When are we going after him?

Be patient. We all want to go after him, but it's not yet time.

The enemy has vanished into the shadows. The trail is cold. Believe me, I've already sent my best scouts after them.
This goes beyond $map:02000076$. $map:02000100$ was also attacked. All of Maple World is in danger.
We must report this to the empress. Make a plan. Learn who our enemies are and what they're trying to do.
My dad may never... may never get better. You wanna waste time kissing the empress's feet?!
I've got a better plan. We'll round up the villagers and go. That monster can't have gotten too far!
$npcName:11000015$ is right. We can't win this battle if we go in blind. My men are already preparing to return to $map:02000001$.
Those guys took out one of the Seven Heroes, and you already wanna leave? Are you stupid?!

Argh!

Wait...!

Do you know how long I've been looking for you?
$npcName:11003243$? What are you doing here?
$npcName:11000101$ told me all about your wild exploits. What are you going to do when your dad finds out?
I'm trying to make things right! If you aren't gonna help me, then get out of my way.
Ugh. You don't even get what's going on around you! When are you going to grow up?

Wait, dad went to the $map:02000054$? Beyond the southwest checkpoint?
That's right. That's your patrol route. But you decided to run off, so the old man went there in your place!
He's too old to be out there.
It's time to prove myself! For real this time!
$npc:11003242$! Where are you going? Hey!
Jeez. I wish $npcName:11003239$ was my dad. I'd be a good kid...

$MyPCName$! We didn't have enough manpower after the battle, so the elder decided to chip in.
It's not safe for him out there.
You're right. Please go to the $map:02000054$ and help out. $npcName:11000547$ should already be there.
$npcName:11003239$ went with $npcName:11000015$, so he's not completely helpless. I'd better go after $npcName:11003242$...
Who are you? What do you want with us?!
And what makes you think I have any desire or obligation to answer to you?
Were you behind the attack on $map:02000100$?
What's this? We have a celebrity in our midst. One of Maple World's greatest heroes, $npcName:11003308$.
But you are so old and feeble now. Naught but skin and bones! A shadow of your former self.
Silence! The likes of you aren't fit to even talk to him!
Do not be offended, elf. I am simply... concerned. The elderly should stay at home, where they can sleep away what little time they have left.
Don't you talk to my dad like that!
Ah, the son of the hero! I shall destroy you myself.
No! $npcName:11003364$!
Father...
$npcName:11003308$!
How disappointing. The former hero cannot even save his child's life, let alone his own.
In the end, mortal flesh is weak. Such a delicious tragedy.
Stop right there!
$MyPCName$? How intriguing! Unfortunately, my business here is done.
Dispose of them.
We have to get $npcName:11003308$ to safety. We don't have time for these goons!
$npcName:11003364$... Are you all right?
No... No, I'm not! You said I was useless. Pathetic... Then why did you...?
You can't just dive into danger like in the old days! Not for... not for my sake!
The only thing I fear in this world... is losing you...
I didn't want you to feel trapped under my shadow... So I pushed you to be your best... but all I've done is hurt you...
My heart ached as I watched you suffer. But it was all my doing... You are not to blame...
$npcName:11003364$... My son...
I believe in you. You can be great... even without me...
N-no... Father!!

And I'm $npcName:11003252$. Pleased to meet ya!
Which one of you is the exceptional student $npcName:11003250$ told me about?
We're just freshmen, silly! Maybe we'll be exceptional next year.
Oh, we will be. I'm gonna be a hero, just like $MyPCName$!
$npcName:11003252$, you sound like an idiot.
Bright kids...
Ahem! We're here to take you to her. Follow us!
She's waiting for you on the school grounds. The class president herself, $npcName:11003146$.
$npcName:11003146$ is the best mage to ever study here, ever. She's the Queen of Ellinel, as smart as she is pretty!
She's just some rich brat who clings to $npcName:11000032$'s robe. Being the teacher's pet doesn't make her smart!
That's pretty harsh...
Anyway, how can I become a great adventurer like you, $MyPCName$? I want $npcName:11000032$ and the headmaster to send me on quests, too!
Adventuring is my dream job! Please, tell me!
There's not really much to it...
Just ignore him. That's what the rest of us do.
$npcName:11003253$, you twerp!
About $npcName:11003146$. I wouldn't take anything she says personal, if I were you...
I'm going to tell $npcName:11003146$ you said that!
Go ahead! I don't care!
We're here. Just go through the door.
We better get to class. See ya later!

How long do you intend to make me wait, exactly?
Remember, I'm doing this for $npcName:11000032$...
Kaitlyn
Ellinel Class President

Come with me to the $map:52000134$ and you'll find out.
On second thought, I don't actually care. The headmaster is busy and I have more work for you.
I'm sure you can take care of whatever it is without my help.
I don't have time to deal with those brats. The professor needs my assistance with his very important research!
Oh, $MyPCName$!
I was just thinking about you.
Professor! How's your research going?
Well... There's one experiment I haven't been able to reproduce. I suspect you know the one I'm talking about.
The experiment with the aino crystal?
That's right. No matter how hard I try, I can't replicate our results. I'm missing something...
Could it be $MyPCName$? $male:He,female:She$ may have some innate trait that tainted the results. Like the spiritual equivalent of sneezing on a Petri dish.
Or maybe I forgot to wash my hands before touching the reagents. Who can say? All I know is that I can't concentrate for too long since that experiment. I've even blacked out a few times.
Ah, but don't worry about me. One doesn't get into magical research without being prepared for such risks.
That's true. Even our freshmen are fearless. Honestly, sneaking into the professor's magical supplies and running off into the wilderness...
He said he wanted to be like $MyPCName$. Imagine that! These kids have no sense in their heads.
A freshman... took from my supplies...?
Tell me everything. Now!
This is an aino crystal. We used them when we originally sealed away the Land of Darkness.
If my hypothesis is correct, then this crystal will react if we place a $item:20000045$ near it.
$MyPCName$, would you do the honor? I've got a spare $item:20000045$ if you need it.
Look, it's reacting! That means that the mushrooms themselves are aligned with the darkness.
After I came up with my little hypothesis, I created a special soil to let me cultivate $itemPlural:20000045$.
When cultivated, the mushrooms seemed to attract monsters. Most informative... if annoying.
By extracting energy from the $itemPlural:20000045$, I was able to devise a treatment for shadow poisoning. I'm sure you recall the $item:20000016$ I had you make.
Normally, shadow poisoning burrows deep into its victim and hides. It's hard enough to detect, let alone treat... and here we have a potential cure in our hands!
Impressive. Have you reported this to our allies?
Not yet. This is still far too experimental to share.
This crystal...
Ack!
No!
What happened?
I've never seen the crystal react like this.
I didn't do anything. I just...

The dragon-man?

He's from another planet...?
Indeed. In the past, it was possible to cross between worlds through interdimensional doors.
But those doors vanished with the goddesses. How did such a person make it here? That is a mystery.
But what does he want? Why come all this way for the Lumenstone?
I can't rightly say. He called himself $npcName:11003053$, and as he left, he chanted...
Kaiser...

He hungers for power. I could tell that much from the look in his eyes.
Trouble! We're in trouble! We found Mika... but so did that monster!
Where?!
In the sanctum of Nazkar Temple! You have to hurry!

...Unexpected guests have arrived...
